                        <!-- 二级评论 -->
                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-container">
                                                                    <!-- .comment-main-list-item-child 为完整的一条二级评论 -->
                                    <!-- data-comment-id 评论id -->
                                    <!-- data-comment-id-top 此二级评论所属的一级评论id -->

                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <!-- 点赞后嵌套 class red -->
                                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_287427043" data-item="3, 1, 287427043, 98774502, 287427043">

                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="98774502">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="287427043">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给知守观"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">
                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">
                                        <i class="icon-expression"></i>
                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-container">

                    </div>

                                                <div>

                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment">
                                                <span>线下消费，线上消费都可以，实付5元还是10元以上就行了 <img src="//res.smzdm.com/resources/public/img/emoji/small/aru/02-[高兴].png" alt="[高兴]" class="wp-smiley"> </span>
                                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <div class="list-item-level1">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
